<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Predator's Growl](/Feats.aspx?ID=2324) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Trigger**
You successfully [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) a [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) creature.

</column>

---

You give a throaty growl to attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a creature you just found. You don't take the –4 penalty for not sharing a language with the creature.
name: Predator's Growl
